abstract.text: Sends an application protocol data unit (APDU) to the tag and receives a response APDU.

inlineContent.text: An application protocol data unit to send to the tag.
A handler that the reader session invokes after the operation completes. The handler has the following parameters:
The response data, which may be empty even if the operation completes successfully.
responseData
The SW1 command-processing status byte. This value is always valid.
sw1
The SW2 command-processing status byte. This value is always valid.
sw2
when the operation completes successfully; otherwise, an
object when there’s a communication issue with the tag.
error

abstract.text: Detect NFC tags, read messages that contain NDEF data, and save data to writable tags.
An object representing an ISO 7816 application protocol data unit (APDU).
The value of the P1 parameter byte.
An object containing the response from the tag.
An interface for interacting with an ISO 7816 tag.
Sends an application protocol data unit (APDU) to the tag and receives a response APDU.
Sends an application protocol data unit (APDU) to the tag and receives a response APDU.
A security violation associated with the reader session has occurred.
A reader session for detecting ISO7816, ISO15693, FeliCa, and MIFARE tags.
A list of application identifiers that the app supports.
Information about an error condition including a domain, a domain-specific error code, and application-specific information.

A type representing an error value that can be thrown.
